Title: Peso's Challenge Note
Text:
To anyone who finds this note:

If you come across my body, do not be alarmed.

I was attacked by TDs while exploring and managed to hide behind this waterfall by the skin of my teeth. The wounds are deep... I probably won't see the dawn. But no one said you have to write some famous last words when you're dying, right? We can all relax about it.

I wasn't able to find the legendary treasure of Three Heroes' Crest, but... you're not entirely out of luck. There's a simple challenge. A puzzle. I've hidden my life's savings in a secret hideout in the hunting grounds.

It's located beside the House of Prophecy, beneath the Hornett.

Go and have a look if you're interested. That shall be... the treasure I leave for fellow explorers.

Blast it, my vision... It's beginning to blur. Best of luck to you.

Cheery Peso
